scripts.test: for file in tests/*.mjs; do node --no-warnings --experimental-modules "${file}"; done; set -e; for file in benchmarks/*.mjs; do node --no-warnings --experimental-modules "${file}"; done
scripts.generate-benchmarks: for op in add and div mod mul neg not or sar shl sub xor; do scripts/generate-benchmark.py generate "${op}" > "benchmarks/${op}.mjs"; done
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run build && git status && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || git diff && npm test
